title: Calling all small LoL youtubers , or any in general
body:
Sooooo this is just a question wat if i was to open a new channel where all of us small youtubers ( or any ) could post thier montagse or failtages or any video in general, something like Great Griefers where its like a huge colab channel where videos from different people are put in

we could do the same thing except for well, our montages or watever u want, it could help us grow and im pretty sure if this works we could become big pretty quickly.

how its gonna work is ill set up new Gmail , YT channel and Discord where we could all contribute our stuff. the Gmail will be shared among me and perhaps 3 others ( depends tbh ) where u could send them your stuff. channel name would be decided by everyone and the discord is just for us to be able to play together

every video that gets sent to me or the other people ( ill call them admins for now ) will be uploaded onto the channel youtube. u must link your channel too so that it can be added too the video description, the admins would of course have to state when thier uploading a video on the discord so to advoid confusion. 

this is just a basic idea so yea, if your interested just comment your channel and ill message u on your channel. if u have questions then tell me im open. if this fails then well, lmao kk

replies.body:
I can do this.
Channel Name: Hugoe Beestlee
I got 1 sub XDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
But I would love to contribute
perfect, if u dont mind linking your channel isntead of just the name
erm question, where and how do i message u o-O your option bar is blank and i cant find the thingy
short clip or full montages , etheir will work

I'm in, sounds like a good and interesting concept!
Youtube Channel: MrKillerKow
haha, ty, im waiting for a day to past b4 i see whos in. for now do u mind linking me your channel, the url not the name
